characters.name: Evan
characters.role: transformed human returning to ordinary reality

dialogue.speaker: Evan
dialogue.text: I don't want to lose this

dialogue.speaker: The Architect
dialogue.text: You don't have to hold onto the experience. Let it hold onto you
dialogue.visual_note: form suggests both farewell and eternal presence

actions.action: stands at threshold, hybrid perception folding back to human
materializes like dream becoming solid, ordinary yet extraordinary
steps across threshold, pixels coalescing to flesh with subtle luminescence
returns to digital realm while maintaining eternal connection

environment.description: The boundary between quantum therapeutic space and ordinary reality, where transformation embeds itself into daily life
environment.mood: bittersweet return, integrated transformation, extraordinary ordinary
